summary: The customer is looking to upgrade their internet service with Contoso Wireless and the agent provided them with information about their Ultra-High-Speed plan, which offers up to 1Gbps download speeds and 100Mbps upload speeds. The plan also includes unlimited data and no overage charges, as well as 24/7 customer support and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. The agent also mentioned discounts for bundle packages, as well as a free month of service if the customer signs up now. To upgrade their service, the customer needs to fill out the online form on the Contoso Wireless website.
